author: Chandelis Duster, CNN
title: 'I've got morons on my team': Romney blasts pro-Putin support among GOP
description: Republican Sen. Mitt Romney of Utah on Sunday blasted his fellow GOP members who attended a White nationalist event and those who support Russia President Vladimir Putin as the country invades Ukraine.
